00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_comparer;
00030 using namespace std;
00031 
00032 const string ret = "\r\n";
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * Check if two floats are about the same.
00036  */
00037 void CHPCompareUtils::CompareFloats(float a, float b, string &diffs, const char *msg)
00038 {
00039         const float eps = 0.000001f;
00040         if (fabs(a-b) > eps)
00041         {
00042                 diffs += msg + ret;
00043         }               
00044 }
00045 
00046 /*
00047  * Check integers.
00048  */
00049 void CHPCompareUtils::CompareInts(int a, int b, string &diffs, const char *msg)
00050 {
00051         if (a != b)
00052         {
00053                 diffs += msg + ret;
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * Check strings.
00059  */
00060 void CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(const string &a, const string &b, string &diffs, const char *msg)
00061 {
00062         if (a != b)
00063         {
00064                 diffs += msg + ret;
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*
00069  * Check strings.
00070  */
00071 void CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(const wstring &a, const wstring &b, string &diffs, const char *msg)
00072 {
00073         if (a != b)
00074         {
00075                 diffs += msg + ret;
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*
00080  * Check strings.
00081  */
00082 void CHPCompareUtils::CompareStrings(const string &a, const wstring &b, string &diffs, const char *msg)
00083 {
00084         if (a != StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(b))
00085         {
00086                 diffs += msg + ret;
00087         }
00088 }
